alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 5:13AM MST until January 14 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 5 to 25 below zero. * WHERE...Craigmont, Alpowa Summit, Peck, Clarkston, Lewiston Grade, Kamiah, Nezperce, Soldiers Meadow Road, Culdesac, Lewiston, Winchester, Pomeroy, Gifford, and Lapwai. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
